action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore wagering loss limitation rules.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Winnings And Gains Expense Restoration Act of 2025 or the WAGER Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 165(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (as amended by the Act entitled an Act to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of H. Con. Res. 14. (119th Congress)) is amended by striking for any taxable year and all that follows through shall be allowed and inserting for any taxable year shall be allowed.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
